locations.Dodongos Cavern Compass Chest:
is_adult or has_sticks or 
                (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (has_slingshot or has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword))
locations.GS Dodongo's Cavern East Side Room:
has_explosives or is_adult or has_slingshot or 
                Boomerang or has_sticks or Kokiri_Sword
locations.DC Deku Scrub Deku Sticks:
is_adult or has_slingshot or has_sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword

exits.Dodongos Cavern Climb:
as_either_here(
                    (is_adult or 
                        ((has_sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire)) and 
                            (has_slingshot or has_sticks or has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword)))) and 
                    (has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or 
                        can_use(Dins_Fire) or (logic_dc_staircase and can_use(Bow)))

exits.Dodongos Cavern Far Bridge:
as_child_here(has_slingshot) or 
                as_adult_here(has_bow or Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot) or logic_dc_jump)

locations.King Dodongo Heart:
(has_bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and 
                (is_adult or has_sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
locations.King Dodongo:
(has_bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and 
                (is_adult or has_sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
